tacticulous.game.domain

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • tacticulous.game.domain.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    The Supreme Ruler class; contains and provides access to most elements used by the game.
    Author:
    O

        Returns:
        true if leader is to be killed!!!

        Returns:
        false if too many units for the map.
